description: JSON Schema for inspection class in Elephant Lexicon

completed_date.description: Date when the inspection was completed.

completed_time.description: Time of day when the inspection was completed, e.g., '8:16 AM'.

inspection_status.description: Result or status of the inspection.

inspection_type.description: Type of inspection performed, e.g., '305 Final Electric (R)'.

notes.description: Optional notes or comments regarding the inspection.

requested_date.description: Date when the inspection was requested.

scheduled_date.description: Date when the inspection was scheduled.

title: inspection
